post.author: Admin
post.title: Band Awards Banquet and Presentation
post.description:
Hi Band Families,
On Wednesday, May 11, 2016 all band members and their families are cordially inv
post.content:
Hi Band Families,

On Wednesday, May 11, 2016 all band members and their families are cordially invited to attend the Band Awards Banquet and presentation. Dinner will be served at 6:00 PM and the presentation will begin at 7:00 PM. The Invitation including the RSVP form for this event can be downloaded here.

We need volunteers to help set-up, serve and clean-up after the dinner. If you can help please indicate the time slot you are available by using SignUp Genius.

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me at alandhelenkelly@cox.net or (440) 746-9048.

Thanks,

Helen
Hospitality Committee
